message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $9,500.  I think you'll find this offer very appealing.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is too low for me.  I could come down to $9,000, which is a very fair price considering the value you'll get from it.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $8,750?
